TEXT: CARDINAL . At the material time , the applicant was a police officer and the Secretary General of ORG .

CARDINAL . On DATE Law no . CARDINAL of DATE on certain amendments to LAW ( az Alkotmány módosításáról szóló DATE . évi ORG . törvény ) was published in the NORP Official Gazette . This PERSON amended , inter alia , LAW to the effect that , as from DATE , members of the armed forces , the police and security services were prohibited from joining any political party and from engaging in any political activity ( see paragraph CARDINAL below for the text of the Article ) .

CARDINAL . In a circular letter dated DATE , the Head of ORG requested , in view of the forthcoming parliamentary elections , that police officers refrain from political activities . He referred to Article CARDINAL/B § CARDINAL of the LAW as amended by LAW . CARDINAL of DATE . He indicated that those who wished to pursue political activities would have to leave the police .
CARDINAL . In a second circular letter dated DATE , the Head of ORG declared that no exemption could be given from the prohibition contained in LAW .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG filed a constitutional complaint with ORG claiming that Article CARDINAL/B § CARDINAL of the LAW , as amended by LAW no . CARDINAL of DATE , infringed constitutional rights of career members of the police , was contrary to the generally recognised rules of international law and had been adopted by ORG unconstitutionally .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed the constitutional complaint , holding that it had no competence to annul a provision of the LAW itself .

CARDINAL . Decree no . DATE of the Minister of the ORG ( “ the DATE LAW ) , which laid down service regulations for the police , was in force until DATE and provided :

“ Rendőrök önmagukból – párt kivételével – … a szolgálati viszonyra vonatkozó jogszabályokkal , rendelkezésekkel nem ellentétes célú társadalmi szervezetet létrehozhatnak és működtethetnek ( szakszervezet , tömegmozgalom , érdekképviseleti szervezet , egyesület stb . ) . ”
